TEXT.TITLE: COMTECH <CMTL> TO SELL PREMIER MICROWAVE
TEXT.BODY: Comtech Inc said it agreed in principle to sell 95 pct of its outstanding shares in Premier Microwave Corp for seven mln dlrs. It said the buyers include an investment group composed of the unit's management. The company said it expects the sale to close in the next few weeks. Proceeds will be used to reduce debt. Reuter
